GSD.description:
nbd: fix io hung while disconnecting device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit 67e403136a0e1a55fef6a05f103a3979a39ad3fd. For more details please see the references link.
